summary.raw: Close branch dragdroptab
summary.html: Close branch dragdroptab

values.message: Close branch dragdroptab

summary.raw: Allow drops on whole tab widget instead of just the tab bar
summary.html: Allow drops on whole tab widget instead of just the tab bar

values.message: Allow drops on whole tab widget instead of just the tab bar

summary.raw: Fix bug where unexpected leaveEvents would cance the drag prematurely.
summary.html: Fix bug where unexpected leaveEvents would cance the drag prematurely.

values.message: Fix bug where unexpected leaveEvents would cance the drag prematurely.

summary.raw: Merge with default
summary.html: Merge with default

values.message: Merge with default

summary.raw: Simplified PyQt4 compatibility using qtutils.qt
summary.html: Simplified PyQt4 compatibility using qtutils.qt

values.message: Simplified PyQt4 compatibility using qtutils.qt

summary.raw: Fixed a bug preventing icons from displaying on tabs in Qt4
summary.html: Fixed a bug preventing icons from displaying on tabs in Qt4

values.message: Fixed a bug preventing icons from displaying on tabs in Qt4

summary.raw: Fixed bug which caused animation to not terminate
summary.html: Fixed bug which caused animation to not terminate

values.message: Fixed bug which caused animation to not terminate

summary.raw:
Made it configurable whether the tab widgets accept drops only on
the tab bar, or on the whole widget. Default is only on the bar.
summary.html:
Made it configurable whether the tab widgets accept drops only on
the tab bar, or on the whole widget. Default is only on the bar.

values.message:
Made it configurable whether the tab widgets accept drops only on
the tab bar, or on the whole widget. Default is only on the bar.

summary.raw: The floating tab animates back to its tab bar when released in empty space
summary.html: The floating tab animates back to its tab bar when released in empty space

values.message: The floating tab animates back to its tab bar when released in empty space

summary.raw: Smoother animation
summary.html: Smoother animation

values.message: Smoother animation

summary.raw:
Behaviour more consistent when there are no or one tabs in a widget,
and fixed a bug where animation was wrong after leaveEvents
summary.html:
Behaviour more consistent when there are no or one tabs in a widget,
and fixed a bug where animation was wrong after leaveEvents

values.message:
Behaviour more consistent when there are no or one tabs in a widget,
and fixed a bug where animation was wrong after leaveEvents

summary.raw: Silly bugfix, make the vertical target bigger for landing a tab in a tabbar
summary.html: Silly bugfix, make the vertical target bigger for landing a tab in a tabbar

values.message: Silly bugfix, make the vertical target bigger for landing a tab in a tabbar

summary.raw: Fixed bug where a dropped tab after a leaveevent would not animate back to the right spot.
summary.html: Fixed bug where a dropped tab after a leaveevent would not animate back to the right spot.

values.message: Fixed bug where a dropped tab after a leaveevent would not animate back to the right spot.

summary.raw:
Added a minimum distance the mouse has to have left a widget by
for a tab to be removed.
summary.html:
Added a minimum distance the mouse has to have left a widget by
for a tab to be removed.

values.message:
Added a minimum distance the mouse has to have left a widget by
for a tab to be removed.

summary.raw: Sizehints and changes to the allowed locations of drawing tabs.
summary.html: Sizehints and changes to the allowed locations of drawing tabs.

values.message: Sizehints and changes to the allowed locations of drawing tabs.

summary.raw: Added tab animation
summary.html: Added tab animation

values.message: Added tab animation

summary.raw:
Workaround for tabMoved PyQt4 bug done in a better way so that we can
actually use signals for the animation. Tab insertion done at the correct
position, rather than at the incorrect one followed by an update,
as the latter would cause wrong animation.
summary.html:
Workaround for tabMoved PyQt4 bug done in a better way so that we can
actually use signals for the animation. Tab insertion done at the correct
position, rather than at the incorrect one followed by an update,
as the latter would cause wrong animation.

values.message:
Workaround for tabMoved PyQt4 bug done in a better way so that we can
actually use signals for the animation. Tab insertion done at the correct
position, rather than at the incorrect one followed by an update,
as the latter would cause wrong animation.

summary.raw: Dragged tab animated. Other tabs not yet animated.
summary.html: Dragged tab animated. Other tabs not yet animated.

values.message: Dragged tab animated. Other tabs not yet animated.

summary.raw: Change to tab move algorithm to be more sensible in the presence of animation
summary.html: Change to tab move algorithm to be more sensible in the presence of animation

values.message: Change to tab move algorithm to be more sensible in the presence of animation

summary.raw: Set the groundwork for restoring motion of a dragged tab within a tab bar
summary.html: Set the groundwork for restoring motion of a dragged tab within a tab bar

values.message: Set the groundwork for restoring motion of a dragged tab within a tab bar

summary.raw:
Made 'limbo' an actual TabBar that renders as the tab is dragged around.
It has actual methods so that GUI code interested in changing the tab
properties can actually do so mid drag and it will render.
summary.html:
Made 'limbo' an actual TabBar that renders as the tab is dragged around.
It has actual methods so that GUI code interested in changing the tab
properties can actually do so mid drag and it will render.

values.message:
Made 'limbo' an actual TabBar that renders as the tab is dragged around.
It has actual methods so that GUI code interested in changing the tab
properties can actually do so mid drag and it will render.

summary.raw:
Added new instance variable drag_in_progress that is set to False
when a drag is being cancelled/completed, so that re-entrant event processing
knows not to also attempt to complete/cancel the drag.
summary.html:
Added new instance variable drag_in_progress that is set to False
when a drag is being cancelled/completed, so that re-entrant event processing
knows not to also attempt to complete/cancel the drag.

values.message:
Added new instance variable drag_in_progress that is set to False
when a drag is being cancelled/completed, so that re-entrant event processing
knows not to also attempt to complete/cancel the drag.

summary.raw: Made the DragIcons be parented by the TabBars.
summary.html: Made the DragIcons be parented by the TabBars.

values.message: Made the DragIcons be parented by the TabBars.

summary.raw:
Made the drag icons not be created and destroyed each time, instead they
are re-used.

Added a function tracing debug printer thingy to help work out what's wrong
on macos.
summary.html:
Made the drag icons not be created and destroyed each time, instead they
are re-used.

Added a function tracing debug printer thingy to help work out what's wrong
on macos.

values.message:
Made the drag icons not be created and destroyed each time, instead they
are re-used.

Added a function tracing debug printer thingy to help work out what's wrong
on macos.

summary.raw:
Made the icon whilst dragging a little window instead of a cursor,
so that it hopefully works the same on all platforms.
summary.html:
Made the icon whilst dragging a little window instead of a cursor,
so that it hopefully works the same on all platforms.

values.message:
Made the icon whilst dragging a little window instead of a cursor,
so that it hopefully works the same on all platforms.

summary.raw:
Made the dragging cursor be more persistent.

Made leaveEvents be handled properly (i.e. if focus is lost mid-drag).

Made other mouse buttons be ignored by the event handlers.
summary.html:
Made the dragging cursor be more persistent.

Made leaveEvents be handled properly (i.e. if focus is lost mid-drag).

Made other mouse buttons be ignored by the event handlers.

values.message:
Made the dragging cursor be more persistent.

Made leaveEvents be handled properly (i.e. if focus is lost mid-drag).

Made other mouse buttons be ignored by the event handlers.

summary.raw:
Clear instance variables once drag is complete. This has
no effect but is good practice in case future code wants
to check them to see if a drag is in progress.
summary.html:
Clear instance variables once drag is complete. This has
no effect but is good practice in case future code wants
to check them to see if a drag is in progress.

values.message:
Clear instance variables once drag is complete. This has
no effect but is good practice in case future code wants
to check them to see if a drag is in progress.

summary.raw: Cursor during drag includes right border of the tab.
summary.html: Cursor during drag includes right border of the tab.

values.message: Cursor during drag includes right border of the tab.

summary.raw: Avoid unnecessary if statement
summary.html: Avoid unnecessary if statement

values.message: Avoid unnecessary if statement

summary.raw:
Made the drag initiate as soon as you leave the tabBar, rather
than waiting for you to leave the whole widget. This is more
like the behaviour of other applications with this feature.
summary.html:
Made the drag initiate as soon as you leave the tabBar, rather
than waiting for you to leave the whole widget. This is more
like the behaviour of other applications with this feature.

values.message:
Made the drag initiate as soon as you leave the tabBar, rather
than waiting for you to leave the whole widget. This is more
like the behaviour of other applications with this feature.

summary.raw:
Make the cursor turn into a floating picture of the tab during
a tab drag
summary.html:
Make the cursor turn into a floating picture of the tab during
a tab drag

values.message:
Make the cursor turn into a floating picture of the tab during
a tab drag

summary.raw: Re-added accidentally removed copyright header
summary.html: Re-added accidentally removed copyright header

values.message: Re-added accidentally removed copyright header

summary.raw:
Fixed failure to transform coordinates to that of the
other widget when calling its methods.
summary.html:
Fixed failure to transform coordinates to that of the
other widget when calling its methods.

values.message:
Fixed failure to transform coordinates to that of the
other widget when calling its methods.

summary.raw:
Reimplemented dragdroptab.

Lost: mouse icon changing during drag, animation when moving tabs
within a tabbar.

Gained: Doesn't crash or lose tabs.

The lost functionality can plausible be re-added without compromising
on the lack of crashing. I just haven't looked into it much yet.
summary.html:
Reimplemented dragdroptab.

Lost: mouse icon changing during drag, animation when moving tabs
within a tabbar.

Gained: Doesn't crash or lose tabs.

The lost functionality can plausible be re-added without compromising
on the lack of crashing. I just haven't looked into it much yet.

values.message:
Reimplemented dragdroptab.

Lost: mouse icon changing during drag, animation when moving tabs
within a tabbar.

Gained: Doesn't crash or lose tabs.

The lost functionality can plausible be re-added without compromising
on the lack of crashing. I just haven't looked into it much yet.
